content: Voting Accessibility Advisory Committee | San Francisco Skip to main content English Español 中文 Filipino Menu Services Departments Search Part of Department of Elections Voting Accessibility Advisory Committee Any member of the public can join the Voting Accessibility Advisory Committee (VAAC). Members of the VAAC work together to find new ways to make voting easier and more accessible. VAAC Interest Form Have a say in how we deliver election services by participating in future VAAC meetings. Agendas from Prior Meetings Access VAAC meeting agendas and minutes from 2014 to 2022.
